title: EBSI Natural Person Verifiable ID
description: Schema of an EBSI Verifiable ID for a natural person

@context.description: Defines semantic context of the Verifiable ID

id.description: Defines unique identifier of the Verifiable ID

issuer.description: Defines the issuer of the Verifiable ID

issuanceDate.description: Defines when the Verifiable ID was issued

validFrom.description: Defines the date and time, when the Verifiable ID becomes valid

expirationDate.description: Defines the date and time, when the Verifiable ID expires

credentialSubject.description: Defines information about the subject that is described by the Verifiable ID

id.description: Defines unique identifier of the credential subject

familyName.description: Defines current family name(s) of the credential subject

firstName.description: Defines current first name(s) of the credential subject

dateOfBirth.description: Defines date of birth of the credential subject

personalIdentifier.description: Defines the unique national identifier of the credential subject (constructed by the sending Member State in accordance with the technical specifications for the purposes of cross-border identification and which is as persistent as possible in time)

nameAndFamilyNameAtBirth.description: Defines the first and the family name(s) of the credential subject at the time of their birth

placeOfBirth.description: Defines the place where the credential subjectis born

currentAddress.description: Defines the current address of the credential subject

gender.description: Defines the gender of the credential subject

credentialStatus.description: Contains information about how to verify the status of the Verifiable ID (via the Revocation and Endorsement Registry, RER)

id.description: References record in the Revocation and Endorsement Registry (RER) to enable verification of a Verifiable IDâ€™s validity

type.description: Defines the Verifiable Credential status type

credentialSchema.description: Contains information about the credential schema (template) on which the Verifiable ID is based

id.description: References the credential schema (template) stored on the (relevant) Trusted Schemas Registry (TSR) on which the Verifiable ID is based

evidence.description: Contains information about the process which resulted in the issuance of the Verifiable ID

id.description: References the issuance policy stored on the (relevant) Trusted Schemas Registry (TSR) that has been followed for issuing the Verifiable ID

verifier.description: Defines entity which has verified documents before Verifiable ID issuance

evidenceDocument.description: Defines document(s) which have been verified before Verifiable ID issuance

subjectPresence.description: Defines if the Verifiable ID subject was physically present in the course of the verification

documentPresence.description: Defines how the document(s) which have been verified before Verifiable ID issuance have been provided (e.g. physically, digitally)

proofPurpose.description: Defines the purpose of the proof

created.description: Defines the date and time, when the proof has been created

verificationMethod.description: Contains information about the verification method / proof mechanisms

jws.description: Defines the proof value in JWS format
